Room.Name: Gracella's Herbal Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the herbal shop operated by the eldest daughter of Granovetter.
Room.LongDescription: Gracella has a special rapport with the nymphs who live on the south side of the garden, and has often been blessed by the nymph queen herself. She uses most of the profits from this shoppe for the betterment of the nymph community. A sign says that love potions are discounted this month.
